item.title: 美联储鲍曼呼吁谨慎对待利率问题
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）是美国央行最鹰派的决策者之一，她周三呼吁对任何进一步降息采取谨慎态度，并指出通胀仍然令人担忧，劳动力市场强劲。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman, among the U.S. central bank's most hawkish policymakers, on Wednesday called for a cautious approach to any further interest rate cuts, noting that inflation remains a concern and the labor market is strong.】

item.title: PIMCO 看好股市，寄希望于美国经济软着陆，对通胀持谨慎态度
item.description: 对美国经济的乐观展望促使美国债券巨头 PIMCO 转而青睐股票和其他一些风险资产，同时寻求防范通胀，因为新一届美国政府可能会实施一些对物价造成上涨压力的政策。【原文：An optimistic outlook on the U.S. economy is prompting U.S. bond giant PIMCO to favor stocks and some other risk assets, while seeking protection against inflation as the new U.S. government could implement policies that put upward pressure on prices.】

item.title: 意法半导体首席执行官表示，芯片制造商需要中国，因此意法半导体与华虹合作
item.description: 欧洲电脑芯片制造商意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics）首席执行官周三宣布了与中国代工企业华虹合作的新计划，认为在中国本地生产对其竞争地位至关重要。【原文：The chief executive of European computer chipmaker STMicroelectronics on Wednesday announced new plans to partner with Chinese foundry Hua Hong , arguing that having local manufacturing in China is vital to its competitive position.】

item.title: 阿诺特家族表示，LVMH 品牌可以选择是否与巴黎足球俱乐部（Paris FC）建立合作关系
item.description: 亿万富翁伯纳德-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）之子安托万-阿尔诺（Antoine Arnault）周三表示，一旦 LVMH 集团获得法国巴黎足球俱乐部的控股权，阿尔诺家族控股公司将不会向 LVMH 品牌施压，迫使其与巴黎足球俱乐部建立合作关系。【原文：The Arnault family holding will not pressure LVMH brands into forging partnerships with Paris FC once it acquires a controlling stake in the French capital's soccer club, Antoine Arnault, son of billionaire Bernard Arnault, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: UAW 称福特肯塔基电池厂大部分工人签署了工会卡
item.description: 美国肯塔基州福特汽车电池厂工会周三表示，该厂大多数工人已签署了支持美国汽车工人联合会的卡片。【原文：A majority of workers at a Ford Motor battery plant in Kentucky have signed cards indicating their support for the United Auto Workers, the union said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储库克预计通货紧缩将持续，更多削减可能是适当的
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周三表示，美国通胀继续缓解，工资和就业市场降温，价格过度上涨主要限于住房，在这种情况下，继续降息可能仍然是合适的。【原文：U.S. inflation continues to ease, with wages and the job market cooling and excess price increases largely confined to housing, a situation in which it will likely remain appropriate to continue cutting interest rates, Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，欧佩克+可能会在更长时间内坚持大幅减产石油
item.description: 消息人士和分析师说，欧佩克+将在 12 月举行会议，届时在石油政策方面几乎没有回旋余地：由于需求疲软，增加产量将是冒险之举，而由于一些成员国希望增加抽油量，因此很难深化供应削减。【原文：OPEC+ will have little room to manoeuvre on oil policy when it meets in December: it would be risky to increase output because of weak demand, and difficult to deepen supply cuts because some members want to pump more, sources and analysts said.】

item.title: 班克曼-弗里德的前副手王避免因加密货币欺诈入狱
item.description: 前加密货币高管加里-王（Gary Wang）编写了计算机代码，帮助 FTX 创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）从现已破产的交易所客户那里窃取了约 80 亿美元。【原文：Former cryptocurrency executive Gary Wang, who wrote the computer code that helped FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried steal about $8 billion from customers of the now-bankrupt exchange, was spared prison time by a judge on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国生物技术公司莱克纳与礼来合作开发保护肌肉的肥胖症药物
item.description: 礼来公司和在香港上市的莱克纳公司周三表示，双方将合作开发一种实验性肥胖症药物，旨在帮助患者减肥的同时保留肌肉。【原文：Eli Lilly and Hong Kong-listed Laekna will collaborate to develop an experimental obesity drug that aims to help patients lose weight while preserving muscle, the biotech said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 暂停意大利南部工厂的生产
item.description: 由于产品需求持续疲软，Stellantis 周三宣布其位于意大利南部的两家工厂暂时停工。【原文：Stellantis on Wednesday announced new temporary stoppages for two of its plants in southern Italy as the automaker continues to suffer from weak demand for its products.】

item.title: Firstrade 将提供隔夜交易服务，加入越来越多的美国经纪商行列
item.description: 在线经纪商 Firstrade 计划于 2025 年初推出隔夜交易，这是最近一家希望为零售客户提供在正常营业时间以外交易美国股票和交易所交易基金机会的公司。【原文：Online brokerage Firstrade plans to launch overnight trading in early 2025, the latest firm looking to offer retail clients the chance to trade US stocks and exchange-traded funds outside of regular hours.】

item.title: 美国为 GlobalFoundries 扩大生产敲定 15 亿美元芯片奖
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，已敲定向 GlobalFoundries 提供 15 亿美元的政府补贴，以扩大其在马耳他、纽约和佛蒙特州的半导体生产。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Wednesday it has finalized a $1.5 billion government subsidy for GlobalFoundries to expand semiconductor production in Malta, New York and Vermont.】

item.title: 毕马威将斥资 1 亿美元与谷歌云建立人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: 毕马威会计师事务所（KPMG）周三表示，将在未来四年斥资1亿美元，通过与Alphabet的谷歌云（Google Cloud）合作，加强其企业人工智能服务。【原文：KPMG said on Wednesday it would spend $100 million over the next four years to bolster its enterprise artificial intelligence services through a partnership with Alphabet's Google Cloud.】

item.title: 沃尔玛、塔吉特预测不一，假日购物季前景不明
item.description: 今年的 "黑色星期五 "和圣诞节前，零售商们将迎来一个喜忧参半的假日季，因为消费者们会谨慎地控制大额消费，并警惕地用手机比价，以寻找服装、电子产品和玩具的最佳优惠。【原文：Retailers are in for a mixed holiday season this year ahead of Black Friday and Christmas, marked by watchful consumers keeping big spending on a tight leash and vigilantly comparing prices on their mobile phones to look for the best deals on apparel, electronics and toys.】

item.title: 福特将在欧洲裁员 14%，归咎于电动车转型和竞争加剧
item.description: 福特汽车周三表示，将裁减约 14% 的欧洲员工，原因是近年来电动汽车需求疲软、政府对转向电动汽车缺乏支持以及竞争日益激烈，导致福特汽车亏损严重。【原文：Ford said on Wednesday it would cut around 14% of its European workforce, blaming significant losses in recent years compounded by weak demand for electric vehicles, a lack of government support for the shift to EVs, and rising competition.】

item.title: COP29：峰会接近尾声，气候融资谈判面临 "最艰难 "阶段
item.description: 随着周五名义上的最后期限日益临近，谈判室里开始弥漫着对迄今为止缺乏进展的沮丧情绪。【原文：With a notional Friday deadline looming, frustration over the lack of progress so far was starting to seep out of the negotiating rooms.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将分拆部分有线电视网络
item.description: 康卡斯特（Comcast）周三表示，随着流媒体的兴起促使这家媒体公司放弃一些最宝贵的资产，它计划分拆 NBCUniversal 的一些有线电视网络。【原文：Comcast said on Wednesday it plans to spin off some NBCUniversal cable TV networks, as the rise of streaming prompts the media company to relinquish some of its most prized assets.】

item.title: DuckDuckGo 称，谷歌应重新接受欧盟对其技术合规性的调查
item.description: 谷歌的竞争对手互联网搜索引擎 DuckDuckGo 周三表示，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌应面临更多欧盟调查，以了解其是否遵守了欧盟旨在约束大科技公司权力的里程碑式规定。【原文：Alphabet's Google should face additional EU investigations into its compliance with landmark European Union rules aimed at reining in Big Tech's power, rival internet search engine DuckDuckGo said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 券商认为 2025 年 "不确定"，因担心特朗普可能加征关税
item.description: 据主要券商称，美国政策的不确定性可能会在 2025 年适度放缓全球经济增长。他们预计，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的关税建议将加剧全球市场的波动，刺激通胀压力，进而限制主要央行放松货币政策的空间。【原文：Uncertainties around U.S. policies may slow global economic growth modestly in 2025, according to major brokerages. They expect U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs to fuel volatility across global markets, spurring inflationary pressures and, in turn, limiting the scope for major central banks to ease monetary policy.】

item.title: 全球 20 强家族零售企业
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司上周收到了来自其创始人伊藤家族一位成员的收购提议，该提议可能以 580 亿美元的白刃战出价将该公司私有化，并允许其在现有管理层的管理下继续运营。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings received a buyout proposal from a member of its founding Ito family last week, a potential $58 billion white-knight bid which would see the company go private and allow it to continue operating under current management.】

item.title: Rystad 称，石油巨头在生物燃料领域押下重注，到 2030 年将实施 40 多个项目
item.description: 咨询公司 Rystad 在一份报告中称，大型石油和天然气公司已经加大了对生物燃料领域的投资，押注于可持续航空燃料 (SAF)，预计到 2030 年将有 43 个项目投入运营。【原文：Major oil and gas companies have ramped up investments in the biofuels sector, betting on sustainable aviation fuel (SAF), with 43 projects expected to be up and running by 2030, consultancy Rystad said in a report.】

item.title: TJX 上调年度利润预期，原因是非卖品商店吸引了讨价还价者
item.description: TJX Cos 周三上调了年度利润预期，主要得益于成本下降，以及资金紧张的顾客对其非价格商店的服装和鞋类等产品的强劲需求。【原文：TJX Cos raised its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, benefiting from lower costs and strong demand from cash-strapped customers flocking to its off-price stores for products such as apparel and footwear.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车公司 Pony AI 在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 45.5 亿美元的估值
item.description: 中国自动驾驶公司小马智行（Pony AI）周三表示，它将在美国进行规模更大的首次公开募股，目标估值高达 45.5 亿美元。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving firm Pony AI said on Wednesday it was targeting a valuation of up to $4.55 billion in its upsized initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 美联储将在 12 月降息，但 2025 年将放缓步伐，原因是存在通胀风险：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，大多数经济学家认为，由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的政策可能导致通胀率上升，美国联邦储备委员会将在下个月降息，但2025年的降息幅度将低于一个月前的预期。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve will trim interest rates next month but make shallower cuts in 2025 than expected just a month ago due to the risk of higher inflation from President-elect Donald Trump's proposed policies, according to most economists in a Reuters poll.】

item.title: 达美航空公司预计 2025 年收入将以中等个位数百分比增长
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周三表示，该公司预计 2025 年的收入将以中个位数的百分比增长，全年运力将增长 3% 至 4%。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Wednesday it expects 2025 revenue to grow by a mid single-digits percentage on a capacity growth of 3% to 4% for the year.】

item.title: 塔吉特节假日促销淡季不淡，消费者追求经济实惠，股价下跌
item.description: 由于注重价值的消费者在包括沃尔玛在内的竞争对手零售商处购买低价必需品，塔吉特周三预计假日季度可比销售额和利润低于预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 18%。【原文：Target forecast holiday-quarter comparable sales and profit below estimates on Wednesday as value-conscious consumers shopped for low-priced essentials at rival retailers including Walmart, sending its shares down 18% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 苹果公司提议投资 1 亿美元在印尼新建工厂
item.description: 印尼工业部周三表示，科技巨头苹果公司已向印尼提出投资1亿美元建厂生产配件和组件的建议。【原文：Tech giant Apple has made a $100 million investment proposal to Indonesia to build a plant to manufacture accessories and components, the industry ministry said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 辉瑞任命内部人士 Chris Boshoff 为研发主管
item.description: 辉瑞公司周三表示，已任命公司资深人士克里斯-博肖夫（Chris Boshoff）担任研发主管，他曾领导该制药公司的癌症研究和营销工作一年多。【原文：Pfizer said on Wednesday it has named company veteran Chris Boshoff, who led the drugmaker's cancer research and marketing for more than a year, as its chief of research and development.】

item.title: 预期英伟达将发布财报，期货市场交投谨慎
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货变化不大，投资者在等待英伟达（Nvidia）的季度财报，预计该财报对维持这家人工智能巨头今年创纪录的涨势至关重要。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were little changed on Wednesday as investors awaited quarterly results from Nvidia, which are expected to be pivotal in sustaining the AI behemoth's record rally this year.】

item.title: 美国 Nvidia 警惕风险战胜安全
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】
